TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AffectedCountModificationCommandBatch extends Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Update.ReaderModificationCommandBatch
Public MustInherit Class AffectedCountModificationCommandBatch Inherits ReaderModificationCommandBatch

summary.para: A for providers which append an SQL query to find out how many rows were affected (see ).
This type is typically used by database providers; it is generally not used in application code.
